about:
I'm a results-driven Full-Stack Developer with expertise in ReactJS, React Native, JavaScript, TypeScript, NodeJS, and more. Skilled in frontend design, backend development, and restful API integration, I excel in creating user-friendly and scalable applications.
Certified in Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900), I have experience deploying applications on cloud platforms like Azure. Proficient in Git and GitHub for version control, I ensure efficient collaboration and code management.
A quick learner and effective communicator, I thrive in agile development environments, using tools like Jira for project management. Let's build something great together!
